session.missing_id: Session created, but ID not received. Please refresh.

confirmPasswordChange.title: Confirm Password Change
confirmPasswordChange.text: Are you sure you want to change your password? You will need to log in again with the new one.

confirmDeactivate.title: Confirm Account Deactivation
confirmDeactivate.text: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account? You will be logged out and will not be able to access it until it is reactivated.

confirmDelete.title: Confirm Account Deletion
confirmDelete.text: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account? This action is irreversible.

confirmLogout.title: Confirm Log Out
confirmLogout.text: Are you sure you want to log out of your account?

confirmUpdate.title: Confirm Profile Update
confirmUpdate.text: Are you sure you want to save these profile changes?

stats.no_data: No statistics available at the moment.
stats.note_1: Statistics are based on all your recorded sessions. If some sessions were started by mistake, they are also taken into account.
stats.note_2: This data helps you visualize your work habits and identify the days when your concentration is optimal. Use this information to adapt your goals and optimize your schedule.
stats.chart_title: Activity by Day of the Week

userTasks.snackbar_id_missing: Session created, but ID not received. Please refresh.

activeSeance.no_active_sub: Start a new session to track your progress!

list.title: Pomodoro Technique
list.description: Use the Pomodoro Technique to stay focused without burning out. Work in intense intervals followed by short breaks.

list.title: Clear Goals
list.description: Set clear and achievable goals before each study session. This gives you direction and motivates you.

list.title: Music for Concentration
list.description: Listen to soft or ambient music. Certain frequencies can improve your concentration and block out distractions.

list.title: Regular Breaks
list.description: Take a break every 25 minutes to recharge your brain. Short breaks improve retention and reduce fatigue.

list.title: Deep Breathing
list.description: Breathe deeply and relax before you start. Good breathing oxygenates your brain and calms your mind.

list.title: Eliminate Distractions
list.description: Put your phone on airplane mode, close unnecessary tabs. A distraction-free environment is key for intense focus.

list.title: Take Notes by Hand
list.description: Take notes by hand to better retain information. The physical act of writing activates different areas of the brain.

list.title: Reward Yourself
list.description: Reward yourself after a good study session. This reinforces positive habits and makes learning more enjoyable.

list.title: Peak Hours
list.description: Study during the hours you are naturally most concentrated. Identify your circadian rhythm to optimize your sessions.

list.title: Hydration
list.description: Drink water regularly to stay alert. Dehydration can affect your concentration and cognitive performance.

taskList.no_tasks: No tasks linked to the active session.
taskList.no_seance: No active session. Please start a session to view associated tasks.

seanceInactive.title: No active session
seanceInactive.subtitle: Start a new session to track your progress!

errors.date_past: Due date cannot be in the past.

delete.title: Delete Task
delete.text: Are you sure you want to delete this task? This action is irreversible.

confirmation.deleteTaskText: Are you sure you want to delete this task? This action is irreversible.

pomodoro.soon_available: These options will be available soon.

validation.short_break_min: Short break must be at least 5 minutes.
validation.long_break_ratio: Long break must be at least 2x the short break.
validation.break_longer_than_study: The break cannot be longer than the study session.

awaiting_study.message: Come back strong! Ready for the next study session?

errorBoundary.defaultMessage: Unknown error. Please reload the application.

timer.noActiveSession: No active session. Click to create one.

snackbar.error: Failed to stop session. Please try again.

stopTimerDialog.title: Stop session?
stopTimerDialog.content: Are you sure you want to stop the current session? The elapsed time will be saved.
